A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible\, terrible entry into the Star Wars universe. The plot is propelled by one contrivance and implausibility after another... from the idea that starships would engage in a 20 hour slow-mo chase\, to the idea that characters can survive the vacuum of space\, the list goes on and on. Both Leia and Luke's last scenes in a Star Wars film feel wasted here\, and there's not much emotional heft until the very end. Finn's plot line is one big red herring. Rian Johnson\, you should be ashamed
